00077 const BookLoan & BookLoan::operator=(const BookLoan & otherLoan)
00078 {
00079         // Avoid self-assignment
00080         if (this != &otherLoan)
00081         {
00082                 Copy(otherLoan);
00083         }
00084         return *this; // The value of the object that was just assigned.
00085 }

00103 bool BookLoan::operator==(const BookLoan & otherLoan) const
00104 {
00105         // Checking against self ?
00106         // This is an address comparison (i think)  OTHERWISE it will be infinite recursion.  AAA!
00107         if (this != &otherLoan)
00108         {
00109 
00110                 // This BookLoan
00111                 long myBookISBN;
00112                 long myPatronId;
00113                 Date myBorrowedOn;
00114                 Date myDueOn;
00115 
00116                 // Get data members.
00117                 getBookISBN    ( myBookISBN);
00118                 getPatronId    ( myPatronId);
00119                 getBorrowedDate( myBorrowedOn);
00120                 getDueDate     ( myDueOn);
00121 
00122 
00123 
00124                 // Other BookLoan
00125                 long otherBookISBN;
00126                 long otherPatronId;
00127                 Date otherBorrowedOn;
00128                 Date otherDueOn;
00129 
00130                 // Get data members.
00131                 otherLoan.getBookISBN    ( otherBookISBN);
00132                 otherLoan.getPatronId    ( otherPatronId);
00133                 otherLoan.getBorrowedDate( otherBorrowedOn);
00134                 otherLoan.getDueDate     ( otherDueOn);
00135 
00136                 // Equality comparison happens here.
00138                 if      (
00139                                 myBookISBN              == otherBookISBN        &&
00140                                 myPatronId              == otherPatronId        &&
00141                                 myBorrowedOn    == otherBorrowedOn      &&
00142                                 myDueOn                 == otherDueOn
00143                         )
00144                 {
00145                         return true;    // Everything matches exactly. Equal.
00146                 }
00147                 return false;           // Members do not match exactly.  Inequal.
00148         }
00149         else
00150         {
00151                 return true; // this == this.  So they are equal.
00152         }
00153 }

00170 bool BookLoan::operator>(const BookLoan & otherLoan) const
00171 {
00172         long myISBN;
00173         long otherISBN;
00174 
00175         // Compare by ISBN
00176         getBookISBN(myISBN);
00177         otherLoan.getBookISBN(otherISBN);
00178 
00179         if (myISBN > otherISBN)
00180         {
00181                 return true;
00182         }
00183         return false;
00184 }

00205         // Compare by ISBN
00206         getBookISBN(myISBN);
00207         otherLoan.getBookISBN(otherISBN);
00208 
00209         if (myISBN < otherISBN)
00210         {
00211                 return true;
00212         }
00213         return false;
00214 }

00354 void BookLoan::Reset()
00355 {
00356         bookISBN        = 0;    // Not a legal ISBN
00357         patronId    = 0;        // This is the user ID of a patron who cannot use the system.
00358         borrowedOn.Reset();
00359         dueOn.Reset();
00360 }

00372 void BookLoan::Copy(const BookLoan & otherLoan)
00373 {
00374         // Data to get
00375         long otherIsbn;
00376         long otherPatronId;
00377         Date otherBorrowedDate;
00378         Date otherDueDate;
00379 
00380         // Get the data from the other object.
00381         otherLoan.getBookISBN    ( otherIsbn          );
00382         otherLoan.getPatronId    ( otherPatronId     );
00383         otherLoan.getBorrowedDate( otherBorrowedDate );
00384         otherLoan.getDueDate     ( otherDueDate      );
00385 
00386         // Set my data
00387         setBookISBN     (otherIsbn                      );
00388         setPatronId     (otherPatronId          );
00389         setBorrowedDate (otherBorrowedDate      );
00390         setDueDate      (otherDueDate           );
00391 }
